concept.title: System requirements
concept.shortdesc: This document provides minimum system requirements for HCL Sametime Meetings Add-in for Microsoft Outlook. Higher maintenance levels, such as fix packs and service packs, may be supported as they become available.

p.b: HCL Sametime Meetings Add-in System requirements

conbody.p: For information on Sametime Meetings Add-in System requirements, see the System requirements article.
